categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems military bases

nodes.text: The Geonosian War Room was a command post situated inside one of Geonosis' rocky spires. The room featured holographic projectors and various communications stations, manned by Geonosians. Prior to the Battle of Geonosis, the War Room was used to stage large-scale training and exhibition battles, but during the Republic's invasion the room functioned as the primary Separatist command center. It was used by Count Dooku, Geonosian Archduke Poggle the Lesser, and several Neimoidian ambassadors.
